description: Landing page hero section captures attention and communicates value
steps: Navigate to / (home page)
Verify hero section is immediately visible above the fold
Verify headline 'Comfort food, delivered with warmth' or similar is displayed
Verify subheadline explains ghost kitchen concept briefly
Verify primary CTA 'Order Now' button is prominent
Verify secondary CTA 'See Our Menu' is available
Verify warm, inviting food imagery or illustration is displayed
Verify subtle animation (steam, floating elements) adds life

description: How It Works section explains the ghost kitchen process
steps: Scroll to 'How It Works' section
Verify section has clear heading
Verify 3-4 step process is displayed with icons:
- Step 1: Browse our menu of comfort classics
- Step 2: Order online or through delivery apps
- Step 3: Our chefs prepare your meal fresh
- Step 4: Delivered hot to your door
Verify each step has a friendly icon and brief description
Verify visual flow connects the steps

description: Values section communicates Casper's Kitchen philosophy
steps: Scroll to values/about section
Verify section heading like 'Made with Love' or 'Our Kitchen, Your Home'
Verify core values are displayed:
- Fresh ingredients, never frozen
- Recipes inspired by home cooking
- Sustainable packaging
- Supporting local suppliers
Verify each value has an icon and short explanation
Verify warm, cozy imagery or illustrations accompany values

description: Featured menu section showcases popular dishes
steps: Scroll to featured menu section
Verify section heading 'Today's Favorites' or similar
Verify 3-6 featured dishes are displayed as cards
Verify each dish card shows:
- Appetizing food image
- Dish name
- Brief description
- Price
Verify 'View Full Menu' CTA button is present
Verify cards have hover effect with warm shadow lift

description: Testimonials section builds trust with customer stories
steps: Scroll to testimonials section
Verify section heading 'What Our Neighbors Say' or similar
Verify 2-4 customer testimonials are displayed
Verify each testimonial shows:
- Quote text
- Customer name
- Optional: customer photo or avatar
Verify testimonials have cozy, card-style presentation

description: Delivery area section shows service coverage
steps: Scroll to delivery area section
Verify section explains delivery zones
Verify option to check if address is in delivery range
Verify delivery time estimates are shown
Verify partner delivery app logos if applicable (DoorDash, UberEats, etc.)
Scroll to newsletter section
Verify inviting headline like 'Join the Kitchen Family'
Verify email input field is present
Verify subscribe button is present
Verify privacy-friendly messaging
Verify incentive mention (e.g., '10% off your first order')

description: Footer provides essential links and info
steps: Scroll to footer
Verify Casper's Kitchen logo is displayed
Verify navigation links: Menu, About, Contact, FAQ
Verify delivery hours are listed
Verify contact information (email, phone)
Verify social media links
Verify copyright and legal links (Privacy, Terms)

description: Landing page responsive design works on mobile
steps: View landing page on mobile viewport (375px)
Verify hero section stacks properly, CTA remains prominent
Verify How It Works steps stack vertically
Verify menu cards display in single column or 2-column grid
Verify all text is readable without horizontal scrolling
Verify touch targets are at least 44px
Verify navigation converts to mobile menu

description: Landing page responsive design works on tablet
steps: View landing page on tablet viewport (768px)
Verify layout adapts appropriately (2-column where suitable)
Verify images scale properly
Verify navigation is accessible

description: Page load animation creates welcoming experience
steps: Navigate to landing page fresh (clear cache)
Verify hero elements fade in with staggered timing
Verify animation is subtle and quick (under 800ms total)
Verify animation respects prefers-reduced-motion
Verify no layout shift during animation
Scroll down the landing page
Verify sections fade/slide in as they enter viewport
Verify animations are subtle and don't distract
Verify animations only play once
Verify animations respect prefers-reduced-motion
Toggle to dark mode
Verify background changes to warm dark tone (not pure black)
Verify text remains readable with warm tint
Verify primary orange colors remain vibrant
Verify images/illustrations adapt or remain cohesive
Verify overall 'cozy night kitchen' atmosphere
View landing page
Verify Casper's Kitchen logo is in header
Verify navigation links: Menu, How It Works, About
Verify 'Order Now' CTA button is prominent
Verify header becomes sticky on scroll
Verify header has subtle shadow when sticky
Run accessibility audit on landing page
Verify all images have descriptive alt text
Verify heading hierarchy is correct (h1 -> h2 -> h3)
Verify color contrast meets WCAG AA standards
Verify all interactive elements are keyboard accessible
Verify focus indicators are visible
Verify no content is conveyed by color alone
Measure landing page load time
Verify Largest Contentful Paint under 2.5 seconds
Verify First Input Delay under 100ms
Verify Cumulative Layout Shift under 0.1
Verify images are optimized (WebP/AVIF, proper sizing)
Verify critical CSS is inlined or prioritized

description: Landing page is optimized for search engines
steps: Inspect page meta tags
Verify title tag includes 'Casper's Kitchen' and key value prop
Verify meta description is compelling and under 160 chars
Verify Open Graph tags are set for social sharing
Verify semantic HTML structure (header, main, sections, footer)
Verify page has single h1 tag
